SearchWipActHistory.MainSQL: SELECT CSTID , LOTID , ACTID , ACTDTTM , PROCID , ROUTID , PROCID , EQSGID , EQPTID , WIPSTAT , WIPNOTE , USERID , LOTTYPE , SRCTYPE from WipActHistory with (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND CONVERT(CHAR(10), ACTDTTM, 20) BETWEEN @StartTime AND @EndTime +Option1 +Option2 order by ACTDTTM desc
